item.title: Report E-2024060452
item.description:
Report E-2024060452

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-24T15:13:21+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-04
  • City: DE FOREST
  • State: WI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: VEOLIA ES TECHNICAL SOLUTIONS, L.L.C.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: While parked at a truck stop, the Veolia driver noticed a leak coming from the front of the trailer. The driver notified Veolia management personnel and applied oil dry to the material that released to the ground. Veolia employees investigated the spill and discovered the container had tipped over while in transportation and leaked from the drum closure. The spill was remediated, the drum was closed properly and the load was properly secured for continued transportation without any further incident.
